caption.p: MIA and BIA biosynthetic pathways in yeast. Summaries of the (A) monoterpene indole alkaloid biosynthetic pathway, as refactored in yeast, and (B) benzylisoquinoline alkaloid biosynthetic pathway, with example compounds and, in red, their pharmaceutical applications. STR, strictosidine synthase. NCS, norcoclaurine synthase. Solid arrow denotes single reaction. Dashed arrow denotes multiple reactions.
